pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wavelet Methods for Analysing Locally Stationary Time Series // Fitting models for, and simulation of, trend locally stationary wavelet (TLSW) time series models, which take account of time- varying trend and dependence structure in a univariate time series. The TLSW model, and its estimation, is described in McGonigle, Killick and Nunes (2022a) doi:10.1111/jtsa.12643, (2022b) doi:10.1214/22-EJS2044. New users will likely want to start with the TLSW function.
